title: ERROR[08-24|07:12:40] Invalid receipt array RLP
body:

Windows 10  64bit 

Geth version: `geth version`
v1.7.0-unstable-68955ed2/windows-amd64/go1.8.3"

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
Run Geth latest version

#### Backtrace

````
[backtrace]
````
This error only seems to occur on the main net.
This is a regression on the master branch. We're fixing it, but you'll need to resync when the fix is committed.
@fjl hi,when can you fix it? thank u，receipt status  is very useful
This should be fixed on master now. Sorry about the issue.

@karalabe
hi, 
How do you tell if the result of postState is out of gas, 
The root field does not seem to see the failure status
thank u
